p: Host dietary pattern is the pivotal determinant of gut microbiota community, structure, and function [ 51, 52]. In general, the balanced diet with a variation of the prebiotic fibers, probiotics, and polyphenols, promote the healthy, diverse microbiota [ 53]. Improving the diet quality in susceptible individuals for COVID-19 might alleviate their risk of severe infection [ 54]. Despite the inconclusive pieces of evidence, oral probiotics are expecting to be the rational adjunctive option in various viral disease management [ [55], [56], [57]].
